thread.section_title: Acting U.S. Attorney General Removed After Saying She Would Not Defend Trump Immigration Ban – CBS Philly
thread.title: Acting U.S. Attorney General Removed After Saying She Would Not Defend Trump Immigration Ban
thread.title_full: Acting U.S. Attorney General Removed After Saying She Would Not Defend Trump Immigration Ban

author: Ray Boyd
title: Acting U.S. Attorney General Removed After Saying She Would Not Defend Trump Immigration Ban
text:
PHILADELPHIA (CBS) — Acting Attorney General Sally Yates has been relieved of her duties after announcing on Monday that she would not defend President Donald Trump’s executive order regarding immigration. 
JUST IN: Acting U.S. Attorney General Sally Yates removed by White House after saying she would not defend Pres. Trump's immigration ban. pic.twitter.com/k7GoYbvZMZ 
— CBS News (@CBSNews) January 31, 2017 

Trump has named United States Attorney for the Eastern District Dana Boente, the acting attorney general.
